caption.title: Supplementary Movie 1
caption.p: In-situ TEM time-lapse movie of a single-sided coating CuO/CN x nanocable during the first lithiation process. Movie shows progressive lithiation mainly along the axial direction of the nanocable and morphological stability during lithiation. Curvature of nanocable is a result of the stable CN x shell resisting the large volume expansion of CuO core.
